welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Olton, a charming city known for its rich history and friendly locals. Get ready to explore and immerse yourself in the beauty and culture of this quaint town. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Birmingham Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Birmingham Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Birmingham Airport, primarily used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require periodic reconnection.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at West Midlands International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at West Midlands International Airport handles all air freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
